# swc-stackoverflow-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                       | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `userId` | `user-id` | (required) The user id to display | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description              |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| `--swc-background-color` | Background of the card   |
| `--swc-border-color`     | Color of the border line |
| `--swc-border-radius`    | Radius of the card       |
| `--swc-border-type`      | Type of the border line  |
| `--swc-border-width`     | Width of the border line |
| `--swc-width`            | Width of the card        |
